meals.name: Sushi
meals.instructions: Cook rice. Mix vinegar, sugar, and salt. Spread rice on nori. Add fish. Roll and slice.

meals.name: Pizza Margherita
meals.instructions: Spread tomato sauce on dough. Add cheese. Bake. Garnish with basil and drizzle with olive oil.

meals.name: Tacos
meals.instructions: Cook beef. Warm tortillas. Add beef, onions, cilantro. Serve with lime.

meals.name: Peking Duck
meals.instructions: Roast duck. Serve with hoisin sauce, scallions, cucumbers, and pancakes.

meals.name: Pasta Carbonara
meals.instructions: Boil spaghetti. Cook pancetta. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all.

meals.name: Pad Thai
meals.instructions: Cook noodles. Stir-fry shrimp, tofu, and eggs. Add noodles and sauce. Garnish with peanuts and lime.

meals.name: Paella
meals.instructions: Cook chicken. Add rice and saffron. Add seafood, peas, and bell peppers. Simmer until done.

meals.name: Burger
meals.instructions: Form beef into patties. Grill. Serve on buns with cheese, lettuce, tomato, onions, and pickles.

meals.name: Biryani
meals.instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices. Cook rice with saffron. Layer chicken and rice. Cook until done.

meals.name: Croissant
meals.instructions: Make dough. Fold with butter multiple times. Shape and bake.

meals.name: Pho
meals.instructions: Cook noodles. Prepare broth. Add beef and noodles to broth. Serve with bean sprouts, basil, and lime.

meals.name: Samosas
meals.instructions: Make dough from flour and water. Fill with cooked meat, onions, and spices. Fry until golden brown.

meals.name: Bhajias
meals.instructions: Slice potatoes. Coat in spiced chickpea flour batter. Fry until crispy.

meals.name: Mandazi
meals.instructions: Make dough from flour, sugar, coconut milk, and yeast. Fry until golden brown.

meals.name: Chips Masala
meals.instructions: Cook french fries. Toss with tomato sauce, onions, cilantro, and spices.

meals.name: Swahili Fish Curry
meals.instructions: Cook onions and tomatoes with spices. Add fish and coconut milk. Simmer until fish is cooked.

meals.name: Smocha
meals.instructions: Grill smokie sausages. Slice tomatoes and onions, and mix with coriander. Place smokie on chapati, top with the tomato-onion mix and ketchup. Roll up and serve.

meals.name: Pilau
meals.instructions: Cook beef with onions, garlic, ginger, and spices. Add rice and cook until done.

meals.name: Chapati
meals.instructions: Mix flour, water, oil, and salt into a dough. Roll out and cook on a hot griddle.

meals.name: Nyama Choma
meals.instructions: Season beef with salt and pepper. Grill until cooked to desired doneness.

meals.name: Ugali
meals.instructions: Boil water. Slowly add maize flour while stirring. Cook until thickened.

meals.name: Matoke
meals.instructions: Peel and boil plantains. Sauté onions and tomatoes in oil. Mix with plantains and cook until tender.

meals.name: Lasagna
meals.instructions: Layer noodles with beef, tomato sauce, ricotta, and mozzarella. Bake until bubbly.

meals.name: Tortilla Española
meals.instructions: Cook potatoes and onions in oil. Beat eggs and pour over. Cook until set.

meals.name: Ratatouille
meals.instructions: Sauté onions and bell peppers. Add zucchini, eggplant, and tomatoes. Simmer until tender.

meals.name: Kachumbari
meals.instructions: Mix diced tomatoes, onions, and cilantro. Toss with lemon juice and salt.

meals.name: Fish Fry
meals.instructions: Marinate fish with lemon, salt, and spices. Fry in hot oil until crispy.

meals.name: Kuku Choma
meals.instructions: Marinate chicken with lemon, spices, and oil. Grill until cooked through.

meals.name: Mahamri
meals.instructions: Make dough from flour, coconut milk, sugar, yeast, and cardamom. Fry until golden brown.

meals.name: Kaimati
meals.instructions: Make dough from flour, sugar, yeast, and cardamom. Fry in hot oil until golden. Coat with syrup.

meals.name: Mishkaki
meals.instructions: Marinate beef with spices, oil, and lemon. Skewer and grill until cooked through.

meals.name: Mokimo
meals.instructions: Boil potatoes, corn, peas, and pumpkin leaves. Mash together until smooth.

meals.name: Githeri
meals.instructions: Boil corn and beans until tender. Sauté with onions, tomatoes, and spices.

meals.name: Sukuma Wiki
meals.instructions: Sauté onions and tomatoes in oil. Add chopped kale and cook until tender. Season with salt.

meals.name: Irio
meals.instructions: Boil potatoes, peas, corn, and pumpkin leaves. Mash together until smooth.

meals.name: Mbaazi za Nazi
meals.instructions: Cook pigeon peas with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Add coconut milk and simmer until tender.

meals.name: Omena
meals.instructions: Fry omena fish in oil until crispy. Sauté onions and tomatoes, then mix with omena.

meals.name: Kunde
meals.instructions: Cook cowpeas with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Add coconut milk and simmer until tender.

meals.name: Mũthokoi
meals.instructions: Boil maize and beans until tender. Sauté with onions and pumpkin leaves.

meals.name: Sauté Potatoes
meals.instructions: Boil potatoes until tender. Sauté onions in butter, add potatoes and herbs. Cook until golden brown.

meals.name: Viazi Karai
meals.instructions: Boil potatoes and cut into pieces. Coat with spiced flour and deep fry until golden.
